meaningMnemonic: If you want to <kanji>erase</kanji> and <kanji>extinguish</kanji> every lamp and every picture of a lamp in the world, just <vocabulary>erase</vocabulary> them all. Simple as that.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
